name: github-lambda-deployer-workspace
description: AWS infrastructure to deploy Lambda functions from GitHub repositories

scripts.install:all: cd cdk && npm install && cd ../lambdas/api-handler && npm install && cd ../status-analyzer && npm install && cd ../../deployer-container && npm install && cd ../fixer-container && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd lambdas/api-handler && npm run build && cd ../status-analyzer && npm run build && cd ../../deployer-container && npm run build && cd ../fixer-container && npm run build && cd ../cdk && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
